50.title: Holly Robinson Peete Joins Nate as Special Co-Host for the Day! Holly Dishes on 'The Talk' & Nate's First Ever Basement Makeover! Plus, a Bedroom Transformation for One Very Deserving Child
50.plot: Holly Robinson Peete is the co-hostess. Included: a bedroom makeover for an autistic child; holiday treats by Clodagh McKenna.

56.title: Made in America
56.plot: An apartment makeover; classic meals. Also: Lisa Ling gives a tour of her home.

57.title: Rethink, Redo & Restyle: Nate's Upgrades for Rental Homes, Plus Designer Rachel Roy's Favorite 'Fashion Risks That Pay Off'! And 'Gossip Girl' Blake Lively's Best Style & Design Tips

70.title: Jamie Oliver Beats the Clock with a Meal in Minutes/DIY Holiday Wreaths/Fashion Advice with Isaac Mizrahi
70.plot: Jamie Oliver demonstrates how to prepare a meal in minutes. Also: easy-to-make holiday wreaths; fashion advice from Isaac Mizrahi.

92.title: Dream by Design: Create the Most Relaxing Bedroom Ever!
92.plot: A bedroom design to provide maximum relaxation; comfort-food recipes for the winter with chef George Duran; decorating with inexpensive furniture; tips for using the color black at home.

97.title: Nate's Nursery Surprise!
97.plot: Italian recipes for lasagna and arancini with chef Rocco DiSpirito; food delivered to your home; a nursery surprise for one of Nate's staff; a room designed with thrift-store finds.

99.title: Nate Rescues a Viewer from a Home Improvement Disaster!
99.plot: Angie Hicks, founder of Angie's List, offers tips on avoiding home-project mistakes; style expert Lilliana Vazquez talks about wedding fashions. Also: applying vintage style to the home; planning cocktail parties.

101.title: This Season's "Must-Have" Color for Spring Revealed & How to Put It to Work in Your Home & Wardrobe!
101.plot: Lifestyle expert David Stark shows how to throw a champagne-and-dessert party; style editor Lori Bergamotto (Lucky Magazine) presents a military makeover; and Nate shares spring color trends. Also: tips on family-room layouts.

103.title: Color Solutions for Every Room!/Plus How to Customize Your Look at Home & in Your Wardrobe!
103.plot: HGTV's Sabrina Soto reveals three color combinations that work in any room; chef Geoffrey Zakarian shares burger recipes; and Kim Schlegel Whitman (Southern Living) offers spring updates for the bedroom.

106.title: Nate's Ultimate Living & Dining Room Makeover/How to Upgrade Your Look & Style in Just Minutes!
106.plot: Nate surprises two parents with room makeovers; chef Debbie Lee shares a Korean barbecue recipe.

111.title: Nate's Surprise Family Room Makeover & Dinner Ideas from Eden Grinshpan
111.plot: Nate visits one of his favorite home-furnishing stores; Eden Grinshpan (Eden Eats (2011)) shares dinner ideas; style Marni Golden gives two sisters makeovers.

120.title: House Proud All-Stars
120.plot: Chef Guy Fieri offers a tour of his home kitchen; journalist Lisa Ling shares eco- and budget-friendly home-design tips.
